title: Delegates told to stay home for Joe Biden’s nominating convention in Milwaukee
description: Democrats are planning a much smaller four-day event with satellite celebrations designed for television and online broadcast
content: The thing that I believe more than anything is that Donald Trump needs the roar of a crowd to feel he is in charge, Democratic convention CEO Joe Solmonese said. And Joe Biden was born to be in charg… [+5938 chars]
